visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render an area chart with the following specifications: Chart type: area, Chart title: 'Pattern fill plugin demo', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark theme with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Two series with specific data points and custom colors, Custom colors: Series 1 color: '#88e', Series 2 color: '#e88', Additional configurations: Include pattern fills for the area series with specific patterns and colors, set chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an area chart with a dark theme. The chart title and axis labels are styled with white text to contrast against the dark background. The chart includes two data series, each with specific data points and custom colors. The first series uses a light blue color ('#88e') with a pattern fill in a darker blue ('#11d'), while the second series uses a light pink color ('#e88') with a pattern fill in a darker red ('#d11'). The area series are filled with patterns defined by a path, width, height, and opacity. Additional configurations include setting the chart's background color to dark gray, adjusting the top and bottom margins, and styling the legend items with white text.
